short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scans X/Twitter, avoiding scams by marking usernames green if they're in your following list and red if they're not in your list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crypto Twitter Scam Shield scans your X/Twitter following list and highlights usernames green if they're in your list and red if they're not. This is useful in the scenario where a scammer is mimicking a X/Twitter account, sometimes looking almost exactly like an offical page.

Examples of scams - https://www.publish0x.com/spamreports/beware-of-twitterx-gold-verified-scams-xmjmnrn 

Contact miketheblockchaindev@gmail.com for any queries, bugs/issues or feedback.
